name: handsUP!
author: b0rnee

sections.description:
Once installed the handsUP!-Plugin enables your entire WordPress page to be controlled with hand gestures.

  • Custumize interactions to a specific gesture.
  • Add an infobanner to your page to let your users know that your page is “Leap Ready”.
  • LeapCursor is already integrated and can be activated by a single click.

Supported Gestures

  • Swipe Up / Down / Left / Right
  • Circle Left / Right
  • Grab
  • Tap

Supported Controller

  • Leap Motion Controller
sections.installation:
1. Upload the handsUP folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Map interactions to specific gestures in the settings section of the WordPress admin menu.
  4. Check out the descriptions in the handsUP! settings section to specifically costumize the plugin.

short_description: Control your entire blog with Leap Motion hand gestures.
